titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Russian State Military Archives Collection
titlestmt.author: Compiled by staff of Russian State Military Archives (translated by Mary Habeck) and staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday April 18, 2019 at 07:46

did.unittitle: Russian state military archives collection

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The collection consists of photocopies of documents in the Russian State Military Archive (Rossiskii Gosudarstvennyi Voennyi Arkhiv) in Moscow. The documents relate to German-Soviet military and economic relations between 1918 and 1941, and the use of Soviet tanks in the Spanish Civil War, 1936-1939.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Purchased with the assistance of the Smith Richardson Foundation and transferred from the International Security Program; gift of George Hofmann, 2001.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright status for collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Russian State Military Archives Collection (MS 1670). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: For the original annotated list provided by the Russian Military Archives, which includes orginal document numbers, please see Original List.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of photocopies of documents in the Russian State Military Archive (Rossiskii Gosudarstvennyi Voennyi Arkhiv) in Moscow. The documents relate to German-Soviet military and economic relations between 1918 and 1941, and the use of Soviet tanks in the Spanish Civil War, 1936-1939.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in two series and four additions: Series I: German-Soviet Military Cooperation, 1918-1934. Series II. Soviet Tanks in the Spanish Civil War, 1936-1939.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copying of the material in Series I, Series II, Accession 1997-M-036, and Accession 1997-M-149 is prohibited.

did.unittitle: Letter from Antonov to Chicherin
